item.title: [HTB] Machine: Conceal
item.description:
Conceal

Enumeration

  • nmap
└─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.10.116 --min-rate 5000 -T4

Foothold/User

  • We have an interesting entry STRING: IKE VPN password PSK - 9C8B1A372B1878851BE2C097031B6E43
    • Cracking it results in: Dudecake1!
